name: 張世豪
objective:
This course will introduce Google Cloud computing-related technologies to give students a comprehensive understanding of the Google Cloud platform, architecture, services, and programming. Course contents include 1. Cloud storage system architecture, storage network, and virtualization technology, 2. Business continuity operation storage technology, 3. Storage architecture security and management, 4. Cloud scheduling technology, performance, and security, 5. Virtualization Data center construction - virtual computing, storage, network, desktop, and applications, 6. Cloud services and management, 7. Introduction to cloud computing development and enterprise applications, 8. Internship courses and special projects. After the mid-term exam, we will begin to introduce the Internet of Things and development trends, Week 11 Internet of Things information security issues and trends, Week 12 Internet of Things information security detection technology, Week 13 Internet of Things information security detection technology and implementation, Week 14 Internet of Things Security risk assessment, Week 15 final special production, Week 16 final special production, Week 17 final special report, Week 18 final report. 

本課程將導入  Google 雲端運算相關技術，使學生對 Google 雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5. 虛擬化資料中心建置 - 虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6. 雲端服務與管理，7. 雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8. 實習課程與專題計畫。
期中考後將開始介紹物聯網與發展趨勢，第 11 週物聯網資訊安全問題與趨勢，第 12 週物聯網資訊安全檢測技術，第 13 週期末專題製作，第 14 週期末專題製作 ，第 15 週期末專題製作，第 16 週期末專題報告，第 17 週物聯網資訊安全檢測技術與實作，第 18 物聯網安全風險評估
